name: Global ruleset
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
A procedure belonging to the public API should not be removed.
Event attributes should not be removed.
The type of events should not be changed.
An argument in an event attribute should not be changed to false.
An external scope should not be removed.
A return type should not be modified in external procedures.
Parameters should not be removed or added in external procedures.
Parameters should not be modified, renamed, or removed from events..
The type and subtype of parameters should not be modified in events and external procedures.
Modifying the array size of a parameter in events and external procedures should not be performed.
Reducing the array size of a parameter in events and external procedures is should not be performed.
Pages and PageExtensions that have been published should not be deleted, since dependent extensions may break.
Pages that have been published should not be renamed.
Actions that have been published should not be deleted.
Controls that have been published should not be deleted
The compilation target of an application must be a value that is allowed in a multi-tenant SaaS environment.
Removing a var modifier in events is not allowed.
Interface implementations that have been published must not be deleted.
Interfaces that have been published must not be deleted.
A new method to an interface that has been published must not be added.
Adding an interface to an enum that has been published must have a default implementation.
Changing a table extension's target is not allowed.
Decreasing the length of a field is not allowed. This might break the upgrade of existing installations and dependent extensions. If the field part of the primary key, the field length cannot change.
It is not allowed to rename an enum value.
It is not allowed to delete a value from an enum.
Fields must not increase in length.
Objects with an ID that can be referenced and which have been published must not be deleted.
Objects that can be referenced and which have been published must not be deleted.
Objects that can be referenced and which have been published must not be renamed.
One or more dependencies of the previous version of the extension could not be found.
Pages and reports must use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls that contain FlowFilter fields!
Add PromotedOnly=true to some or all promoted actions to avoid identical actions from appearing in both the promoted and default sections of the command bar.
